Articles.Content:
I love how KSP is full of easter eggs to search out and I actually created a whole Mun base around on of the Easter Eggs in the last patch. As there was a 0.14 Easter Eggs patch I thought I may as well whip one up for the new patch to see what people find.

As it stands I know there is one large new, unique easter egg on the Mun, and a returning egg to be found on Minmus.

Please post pics in spoiler tags of any Easter eggs you find.

DO NOT post the locations of any of these, perhaps give hints if people really want them.

Happy exploration!
Bumped to top because this is a good idea.
I\'m going to go round kerbin a few times with may moun detector.
